meanings.definition: The total mass of living organisms in a particular habitat.
meanings.sent1: The biomasses in the forest include trees, insects, and animals.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the biomasses in the ocean to understand marine ecosystems.
meanings.sent3: The biomasses in the garden had a party last night, and the flowers danced under the moonlight.
meanings.sent4: The biomasses of the savanna form a delicate balance of predator and prey.
meanings.sent5: The teacher explained the concept of biomasses using a colorful diagram.

meanings.definition: The total mass of all living organisms in a given area or volume.
meanings.sent1: The biomasses of the pond consist of fish, algae, and frogs.
meanings.sent2: Ecologists measure the biomasses of different ecosystems to compare their productivity.
meanings.sent3: The biomasses in the zoo had a race to see who was the fastest animal.
meanings.sent4: The biomasses of the rainforest create a symphony of sounds at dawn.
meanings.sent5: The documentary showcased the diverse biomasses of the African plains.
